column2: We are rebels and so w have to fight!

With recent events we happened to be at war with a German nation, and it is unfortunate that many people remind us of German connections of our dynasty... perhaps we could cement our Russian identity among the people by renaming 'Petersburg' to 'Petrograd'!
We can try using our money to invest in the key economic sectors of our country, it will surely bring us prosperity!
Upper class is a backbone of our country but this backbone also has responsibilities, we should try cooperating with them for the mutual profit of the state the bourgeoisie and citizens!

The freer the market the freer the people! Or so they say... regardles of our opinions of it is undeniable that there are more than one paths to prosperity, and so we can try forging it on free capital and minimal government intervention.
We don't like capitalism. It's coarse and rough and iritating and it get's everywhere...
Economic Planning is a pathway to many abilities some consider... unnatural...
This is where the fun begins!
Our reforms have proven to be quit successful, people start to see that it is okay to have bigger families and so the economy starts growing!
The time has come, we have done countless reforms, and even more are being carried on, it is time for europeans to acknowledge us!
The time has come, we have done countless reforms, and even more are being carried on, it is time for europeans to acknowledge us!
Just like our father nation of the US, we can not stand just dewlling to the coast, it is time to expand so we can host as many honest African-Americans, returning to 'their' homeland, as possible!

Many people, over the time, have suggested the creation of Jewish state, one particulary fascinating idea is locating it in Madagascar. The Island weren't of much use to us, and creating the Isreali State could provide us with valuable ally in the region, as well as appease both Jewish people and anti-jewish elements that see them as 'hindrance' in our country.

Many European Countries call our country 'Persia', it is misleading name, bearing archaic conotations, and representing only one ethnic group within the Iranian Nation. Perhaps we should try convince international community to change the name of our country in their languages to 'Iran', the name that is used within the country itself.

Slavery is still legal in our country and it could allow us to make some quick money by re-enslaving the people of African descent. It goes without saying, however, that they wont like this idea.... The other issue is reception of international community that, mostly, frowns upon such outdated institution. Furthermore, this decision would be detrimental to our economy in the long run. We should really consider that...

Our government has decided that, for now, the best road to socialism leads through relaxation of our economic policies, and limited capitalism, until productive forces are sufficient enough for transition to communism.
The fastest way to socialism leads through unconditional economic planning that will rapidly develop our productive forces through direct redistribution of value!

We can restructurise our colonial administration and decide wich colonies are to be settled and which exploited, however we have to keep in mind that it will be labour intensive process for our buraucarcy...
Our nation has accumulated substantial treasury reserves, prompting some calls for increased social spending.
The state's vast wealth is becoming conspicuous
column3: demands for distribution to the citizenry grow louder.
the people clamour for their fair share of the national prosperity.

column2: The royal coffers strain under the weight of accumulated gold
The enemy has seized our capital! The government's prestige and authority suffer greatly from this humiliation.
Our nation maintains only a modest naval presence, sufficient for coastal defence but little else.
